# AFLW Tips
**Please note:** This page and its contents are currently only a placeholder for when AFLW tips are available. The values in the table below are simply dummy data used for testing and do not represent actual predictions or outcomes.

## Round 1
```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

winner <- c("St Kilda","North Melbourne","Melbourne","Fremantle","Collingwood","GWS","Brisbane")
loser <- c("Richmond","Geelong","Bulldogs","Adelaide","Carlton","Gold Coast","West Coast")
margin <- c(2,25,10,4,8,18,20)
probability <- c(0.535,0.901,0.607,0.609,0.554,0.756,0.905)
result <- c(1,1,1,0,-1,-1,-1)
abserr <- c(10,5,20,5,NA,NA,NA)

tipstable <- data.frame(winner, loser, margin, probability, result, abserr)

pred_cols <- c("winner","loser","margin","probability")
result_cols <- c("result","abserr")

std_col <- function(...) {
  colDef(align = "center", 
         class = "cell", 
         ...)
}

format_result <- function(value) {
  if (value == -1) "\u23f2"
  else if (value == 0) "\u274c"
  else if (value == 1) "\u2714\ufe0f"
}

prob_colour <- function(x) rgb(colorRamp(c("white", "white", "steelblue3"))(x), maxColorValue = 255)

prob_style <- function(value) {
  color <- prob_colour(value)
  list(background = color)
}

tip_cell <- function(value, index) {
  loser <- paste0("to defeat ",tipstable$loser[index])
          div(
          div(style = list(fontWeight = "bold"), value),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 12), loser))
}
  
table <- reactable(
  tipstable,
  columnGroups = list(
    colGroup(name = "Predictions", columns = pred_cols),
    colGroup(name = "Results", columns = result_cols)
  ),
  columns = list(
    winner = std_col(name = "Tip",
                     cell = tip_cell),
    loser = colDef(show = FALSE),
    margin = std_col(name = "Margin"),
    probability = std_col(name = "Probability",
                          style = prob_style,
                          format = colFormat(percent = TRUE, digits = 1)),
    result = std_col(name = "Tip",
                     cell = format_result),
    abserr = std_col(name = "Absolute Error")
  ),
  bordered = TRUE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  sortable = FALSE,
  theme = reactableTheme(borderColor = "white",
                         groupHeaderStyle = list(fontSize = 22,
                                                 fontweight = "bold",
                                                 backgroundColor = "black",
                                                 color = "white"),
                         headerStyle = list(fontsize = 20,
                                            backgroundColor = "dimgray",
                                            color = "white")))

table

```
